title: Omerta: Kochou no Yume no Hate
original_name: オメルタ ～胡蝶ノ夢ノ果テ～
sinopse: The city of Tokyo is split between two mafia groups: The Dragon Head and The King Caesar organization. Due to a certain incident, the protagonist JJ, a well-known professional assassin, is framed and thus abandons his title, going into hiding—but more problems come his way.
